snippet.title: Midnight Dreams Trailer II
snippet.description: In Midnight Dreams, players are transported into the intriguing dream of Felipe, an eight-year-old boy with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD). Enveloped in an induced coma as part of the enigmatic "Germination" project by the U.D.A.B.A.I. laboratory, Felipe finds himself trapped in a nightmare within a spaceship. As he seeks to escape this distorted reality, he must confront dark obstacles and unravel the secrets surrounding the project. In this atmosphere of mystery and horror elements, players delve into Felipe's deepest fears, accompanying him on his quest for freedom and truth.
